section.title: lms.celery module
section.paragraph: Import celery, load its settings from the django settings and auto discover tasks in all installed django apps.

desc_content.paragraph: Close the cache so that newly forked workers cannot accidentally share the socket with the processes they were forked from. This prevents a race condition in which one worker could get a cache response intended for another worker. We do this in a way that is safe for 1.4 and 1.8 while we still have some 1.4 installations.

section.title: Module contents
section.paragraph: Celery needs to be loaded when the cms modules are so that task registration and discovery can work correctly.
